AssignAdminPermissionsToUser.name: AssignAdminPermissionsToUser
AssignAdminPermissionsToUser.description: Grants permission to add AWS Supply Chain administrator permission to federated user

CreateBillOfMaterialsImportJob.name: CreateBillOfMaterialsImportJob
CreateBillOfMaterialsImportJob.description: Grants permission to create a BillOfMaterialsImportJob which will import a CSV file of BillOfMaterials records

CreateInstance.name: CreateInstance
CreateInstance.description: Grants permission to create a new AWS Supply Chain instance

CreateSSOApplication.name: CreateSSOApplication
CreateSSOApplication.description: Grants permission to create IAM Identity Center application for a AWS Supply Chain instance

DeleteInstance.name: DeleteInstance
DeleteInstance.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Supply Chain instance

DeleteSSOApplication.name: DeleteSSOApplication
DeleteSSOApplication.description: Grants permission to delete IAM Identity Center application of the AWS Supply Chain instance

DescribeInstance.name: DescribeInstance
DescribeInstance.description: Grants permission to view details of an AWS Supply Chain instance

GetBillOfMaterialsImportJob.name: GetBillOfMaterialsImportJob
GetBillOfMaterialsImportJob.description: Grants permission to view status and details of a BillOfMaterialsImportJob

ListAdminUsers.name: ListAdminUsers
ListAdminUsers.description: Grants permission to list AWS Supply Chain administrators of an instance

ListInstances.name: ListInstances
ListInstances.description: Grants permission to view the AWS Supply Chain instances associated with an AWS account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an AWS Supply Chain instance

RemoveAdminPermissionsForUser.name: RemoveAdminPermissionsForUser
RemoveAdminPermissionsForUser.description: Grants permission to remove AWS Supply Chain administrator permission from federated user

SendDataIntegrationEvent.name: SendDataIntegrationEvent
SendDataIntegrationEvent.description: Grants permission to create a DataIntegrationEvent which will ingest data in real-time

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag an AWS Supply Chain instance

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tag from an AWS Supply Chain instance

UpdateInstance.name: UpdateInstance
UpdateInstance.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Supply Chain instance
